name: Crossword Travel - Word Game
description:
The best highly addictive puzzle game to wake up sleeping brains!

A lot of words are hidden.
Find the right alphabet and complete the word.

Are you ready to figure out all the words?
With Word Travel you are able to increase your vocabulary, concentration and spelling skills.

▶ Word Travel Official Fan Page : https://www.facebook.com/superbox01

- This game supports '한국어', 'Indonesian', 'Bahasa malay', 'English', '日本語', '中文简体', '中文繁體', 'Deutsch', 'français', 'Español', 'ไทย', 'Русский', 'Arabic'.

【Word Travel Features】
▣ An exciting word puzzle game for kids and adults alike!
▣ A brain game that will increase your concentration.
▣ Simple and beautiful graphics, easily puzzle challenges!
▣ Over 1,000 special stage modes!
▣ Daily Bonus Rewards given!
▣ Nothing limits! Play as much as you want!
▣ No Wi-Fi? No problem! Play anytime without an internet connection.
▣ A small game that can be downloaded by any device!
▣ Supports all tablets and 16 languages.

【How to play Word Travel】
▣ Swipe simply along the given letters to form a word (or more).
▣ If can't spot a word, Try to challenge by using 'Shuffle'.
▣ If it's difficult, Find the hidden words and get hints.

- This game is acceptable for purchasing the items partially. When purchasing the items, the additional costs could be occurred and limited Consumer Right of Defense according to the item types.

▶ Let's Enjoy SUPERBOX ◀
